# The Control Ring

Use the control ring for quick access to camera functions during shooting. The function assigned to the control ring can be selected by pressing the control ring options button. Choose from:

- STANDARD
- WHITE BALANCE
- FILM SIMULATION
- DIGITAL TELE-CONV.

!Control Ring Diagram

> The function assigned to the control ring can also be selected using  
> **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > CONTROL RING SETTING**.

## STANDARD

When **STANDARD** is selected, the function assigned to the control ring changes with the shooting mode.

| Shooting Mode                  | Function              |
|--------------------------------|-----------------------|
| P, S, A, M                     | Digital teleconverter |
| Advanced Filter                | Filter selection      |
| Panorama/Multiple Exposure     | Film simulation       |

> Regardless of the option selected, when **M** (manual) is chosen with the focus mode selector in shooting mode **P, S, A,** or **M**, the control ring can be used only for manual focus.
